pages.text: One application of the infusion process is the creation of the Totem of Undying, which grants its bearer a chance at a second life, fortifying them when they are on the brink of death. $(br2)Many consider the ability to create such an artifact as further proof of the power of doll magic, likening it to Voodoo.

pages.title: Infusion
pages.text: Such is the price for a second chance at life. Some practitioners deem it too steep, however... so it goes.
